extension.summary: Next Up Episodes - Gets the next episodes to watch for in progress TV shows in the library and sorts by airdate, descending
extension.description: Produces a list of episodes in descending order of air date for in progress shows in the library, for use with skin widgets (e.g. Skin Helper Service Widgets=>Video Addons=>Next Up Episodes
extension.disclaimer: Will only list next up episodes for shows in the library, has no configuration options
